--- create_table_trailing_comma.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64,
  bar int64,
) primary key(
  foo asc,
  bar desc,
)

--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Create:      0,
  Rparen:      83,
  IfNotExists: false,
  Name:        &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 16,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull:       false,
      DefaultExpr:   (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr: (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      Options:       (*ast.ColumnDefOptions)(nil),
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 34,
        NameEnd: 37,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 38,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull:       false,
      DefaultExpr:   (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr: (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      Options:       (*ast.ColumnDefOptions)(nil),
    },
  },
  TableConstraints: []*ast.TableConstraint(nil),
  PrimaryKeys:      []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 66,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 62,
        NameEnd: 65,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Dir: "ASC",
    },
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 77,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 73,
        NameEnd: 76,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Dir: "DESC",
    },
  },
  Cluster:           (*ast.Cluster)(nil),
  RowDeletionPolicy: (*ast.CreateRowDeletionPolicy)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (foo INT64, bar INT64) PRIMARY KEY (foo ASC, bar DESC)
